parameters.name: Scale Type
parameters.description: Choose between Single-Scale or Multi-scale

advanced.description: Determines whether the guitar has a single scale length or multiple scale lengths.

parameters.name: Number of Frets
parameters.description: The total number of frets

advanced.description: The total number of frets on the fretboard, affecting the guitar's range.

parameters.name: Number of Strings
parameters.description: The total number of strings

advanced.description: The number of strings on the guitar, affecting its range and playability.

parameters.name: Neutral Fret
parameters.description: The fret which is perpendicular to the fretboard's centerline when scale lengths aren't equal

advanced.description: For Multi-scale guitars, this is the fret that remains perpendicular to the centerline.

parameters.name: Bass Scale Length
parameters.description: Scale length for the top-most string of a Multi-scale guitar

advanced.description: The scale length for the bass (lowest) string in a Multi-scale guitar setup.

parameters.name: Treble Scale Length
parameters.description: Scale length for the bottom-most string of a Multi-scale guitar

advanced.description: The scale length for the treble (highest) string in a Multi-scale guitar setup.

parameters.name: Overall Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the guitar-- along the X-axis

advanced.description: The total length of the guitar from the tip of the headstock to the end of the body.

parameters.name: Overall Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the guitar-- along the Y-axis

advanced.description: The maximum width of the guitar, typically measured across the lower bout.

parameters.name: Overall Height
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the guitar-- along the Z-axis

advanced.description: The maximum thickness of the guitar, including body and any protruding parts.

parameters.name: Body Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the body-- along the X-axis

advanced.description: The length of the guitar body, measured from the neck joint to the end of the body.

parameters.name: Body Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the body-- along the Y-axis

advanced.description: The maximum width of the guitar body, typically measured across the lower bout.

parameters.name: Body Height
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the guitar body-- along the Z-axis

advanced.description: The thickness of the guitar body, affecting tone and weight.

parameters.name: Headstock Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the headstock-- along the X-axis

advanced.description: The length of the headstock from the nut to the tip.

parameters.name: Headstock Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the headstock-- along the Y-axis

advanced.description: The maximum width of the headstock.

parameters.name: Headstock Height
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the headstock-- along the Z-axis

advanced.description: The thickness of the headstock.

parameters.name: Fretboard Height
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the fretboard-- along the Z-axis

advanced.description: The thickness of the fretboard material.

parameters.name: Heel Extension
parameters.description: Length of the material beyond of the final fret of the fretboard toward the bridge

advanced.description: The extension of the neck beyond the last fret, affecting the neck joint.

parameters.name: Fretboard Extension
parameters.description: Length of the material forward of the nut-edge of the fretboard toward the headstock

advanced.description: The extension of the fretboard beyond the nut, affecting the transition to the headstock.

parameters.name: Nut Bass Margin
parameters.description: The gap between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the nut-end

advanced.description: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the center of the lowest string at the nut.

parameters.name: Heel Bass Margin
parameters.description: The gap between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the heel-end

advanced.description: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the center of the lowest string at the heel.

parameters.name: Saddle Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing between each saddle-- center-to-center

advanced.description: The distance between the centers of adjacent saddles on the bridge.

parameters.name: Nut Slot Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing between each slot on the nut-- center-to-center

advanced.description: The distance between the centers of adjacent string slots on the nut.

parameters.name: Nut Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the nut-- along the Y-axis

advanced.description: The total length of the nut, typically spanning the width of the fretboard.

parameters.name: Nut Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the nut-- along the X-axis

advanced.description: The width of the nut, affecting the transition from headstock to fretboard.

parameters.name: Nut Height
parameters.description: Overall height of the nut-- along the Z-axis

advanced.description: The height of the nut, affecting string action at the first fret.

parameters.name: Nut Slot Depth
parameters.description: The depth of which the nut slot must be cut

advanced.description: The depth of the slot in which the nut sits.

parameters.name: Fret Tang Width
parameters.description: Width of the fret tang for the fret slot

advanced.description: The width of the fret tang, determining the width of the fret slot.

parameters.name: Fret Tang Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the fret tang for the fret slot

advanced.description: The depth of the fret tang, determining how deep the fret sits in the fretboard.

parameters.name: Fret Crown Width
parameters.description: Width of the crown of the fret

advanced.description: The width of the fret crown, affecting playability and tone.

parameters.name: Fret Crown Height
parameters.description: Height of the crown of the fret

advanced.description: The height of the fret crown above the fretboard surface.

parameters.name: Zero Fret Crown Width
parameters.description: Width of the crown of the zero fret

advanced.description: The width of the zero fret crown, if used.

parameters.name: Zero Fret Crown Height
parameters.description: Height of the crown of the zero fret

advanced.description: The height of the zero fret crown above the fretboard surface, if used.

parameters.name: Nut Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard at the nut

advanced.description: The radius of the fretboard curvature at the nut end.

parameters.name: Heel Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard at the heel

advanced.description: The radius of the fretboard curvature at the heel end.

parameters.name: Heel Curve Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard heel-edge curve

advanced.description: The radius of the curve at the heel end of the fretboard.

parameters.name: Heel Fillet Radius
parameters.description: Fillet radius for the fretboard heel-edge corners

advanced.description: The radius of the fillet applied to the corners of the fretboard at the heel.

parameters.name: Blind Fret Slot
parameters.description: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the end of the hidden tang

advanced.description: The length of the fret slot that doesn't extend fully to the edge of the fretboard.

parameters.name: Binding Inset
parameters.description: The distance inward to reduce the perimeter of the fretboard for applying a binding

advanced.description: The depth of the inset for fretboard binding, if used.

parameters.name: Top Fret Marker Diameter
parameters.description: Diameter of the fret markers along the surface of the fretboard

advanced.description: The diameter of the fret position markers on the fretboard surface.

parameters.name: Side Fret Marker Diameter
parameters.description: Diameter of the fret markers along the edge of the fretboard

advanced.description: The diameter of the fret position markers on the side of the fretboard.

parameters.name: Fret Marker Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the fret markers from the surface of the fretboard

advanced.description: The depth of the fret position markers inlaid into the fretboard.

parameters.name: Octave Marker Spacing
parameters.description: The distance between the center points of the fret markers at the octaves

advanced.description: The spacing between the centers of double fret markers at octave positions.

parameters.name: Bass Scallop Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the scallop cut on the bass edge

advanced.description: The depth of scalloping on the bass side of the fretboard, if used.

parameters.name: Treble Scallop Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the scallop cut on the treble edge

advanced.description: The depth of scalloping on the treble side of the fretboard, if used.

parameters.name: Scallop Fillet Radius
parameters.description: This fillet is used to help blend the scallop into the fretboard as desired

advanced.description: The radius of the fillet used to blend the scallop into the fretboard surface.

parameters.name: Fallaway Start Fret
parameters.description: At which fret the fallaway taper begins

advanced.description: The fret number where the fretboard fallaway taper begins.

parameters.name: String 1 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' e ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the highest (thinnest) string, typically the high E string.

parameters.name: String 2 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' B ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the second string, typically the B string.

parameters.name: String 3 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' G ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the third string, typically the G string.

parameters.name: String 4 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' D ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the fourth string, typically the D string.

parameters.name: String 5 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' A ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the fifth string, typically the A string.

parameters.name: String 6 Gauge
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' E ' string

advanced.description: The gauge of the sixth string, typically the low E string.

parameters.name: String 7 Gauge
parameters.description: Reserved for 7-string guitar

advanced.description: The gauge of the seventh string, if present (for 7-string guitars).

parameters.name: String 8 Gauge
parameters.description: Reserved for 8-string guitar

advanced.description: The gauge of the eighth string, if present (for 8-string guitars).

parameters.name: String Action
parameters.description: The clearance between the bottom of strings and the crown of the frets

advanced.description: The height of the strings above the frets, affecting playability and tone.

parameters.name: Bottom Bout Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the bottom bout curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve forming the bottom bout of the guitar body.

parameters.name: Waist Bout Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the waist bout curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve forming the waist of the guitar body.

parameters.name: Top Bout Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the top bout curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve forming the top bout of the guitar body.

parameters.name: Shoulder Bout Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the shoulder bout curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve forming the shoulder of the guitar body.

parameters.name: Hyoid Distance
parameters.description: Distance between the nut and the hyoid of the headstock

advanced.description: The distance from the nut to the point where the headstock begins to widen.

parameters.name: Hyoid Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the hyoid curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve where the headstock begins to widen.

parameters.name: Headstock End Spacing
parameters.description: Distance between the nut and the end of the headstock

advanced.description: The distance from the nut to the tip of the headstock.

parameters.name: Headstock End Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the headstock end curve

advanced.description: The angle of the curve at the tip of the headstock.

parameters.name: 1st Fret Thickness
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the neck at the 1st fret's position- including the fretboard thickness

advanced.description: The total thickness of the neck, including fretboard, at the first fret position.

parameters.name: 12th Fret Thickness
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the neck at the 12th fret's position- including the fretboard thickness

advanced.description: The total thickness of the neck, including fretboard, at the twelfth fret position.

parameters.name: Dexterity
parameters.description: Select the preferred hand orientation for playing the instrument.

advanced.description: Specifies the hand orientation that best suits the player's style and comfort.
